evidence.claim: The University of Minnesota Medical Center utilizes AWS for data storage and application hosting.
They are compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring patient data security and privacy.
Integration of FHIR standards enables interoperability with other health systems.
HL7 standards are used for data exchange between healthcare systems.
The medical center is integrating cloud solutions to enhance data accessibility.

icp.icp_reason: Operates in healthcare with tech stack supporting X12 integrations and automation.
